_sText:
Hi! Long time no C. :D
I got this job to make a map to a friends server. :P
but, suddently he changed his mind and told me he wasn't gonna make a ba_jail server anyway. :(
By then, I was already finished with my map, so I disided I'd put it on FPSB beacuse I don't like wasting my time in nothing at all.
So I wasted a little more of my time to write this extremly long readme note and publishing my map, just for fun.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The map contains:

-Cells.
-A big play arena.
-Healing. (Not spiritual)
-Pool.
-Showers.
-Soccer field.
-Playground.
-Vents.
-Race track.
-Multifuncional dooropener. (1 to open, 1 to close :D)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Effects and Stuff like that!!!

-HDR (that looks good at night. :O)
-Nice light effects in cells.
-Areaportals.
-Top glass windows.
-3D skybox. (got 2 <3 it!!!)
-Advanced soccer settings. (automaticly change the server settinge to soccer settings.)
-Custom skybox.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope U like it :D

PS: U better like it!!!



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Some People don't like HDR. (like me :S)

this is how to turn it off:

write: "mat_hdr_enable 0" in console.

the hdr isn't modifyed correctly when u download the map.
this is the settings u have to us on the server:

1.) write: "buildcubamaps" in console.
2.) write: "mat_hdr_enable 0" in console.
3.) write: "buildcubemaps" in console again.
4.) exit the server.
5.) write "mat_hdr_enable 1" in console.
6,) open the server and the HDR will work properly.


if u didn't get the part on the top... just turn the HDR off :P


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks 2 : KaratekÃ¤fer for the nice skybox texture :D
